trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um painel num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> controlo substitui e adiciona a funcionalidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo de versões anteriores, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e para utilização futura, se escolher.

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Um StatusBarPanel representa um painel individuais no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: Um StatusBarPanel pode conter texto e/ou de um ícone que pode ser utilizado para refletir o estado de uma aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, acessível através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo, para obter, adicionar ou remover um StatusBarPanel individuais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O StatusBarPanel fornece propriedades que lhe permite modificar o comportamento de apresentação de um painel dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>propriedade para apresentar um ícone dentro de um painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada para fornecer uma representação gráfica do Estado de uma aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>propriedade permite-lhe especificar como o texto e/ou de um ícone é alinhado do painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o painel está dimensionados de forma corretamente a ajustar o texto do painel, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>propriedade automaticamente Redimensionar painel para ajustar o texto do painel ou para preencher o restante espaço dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>propriedade permite-lhe especificar uma largura mínima para o painel garantir que não recebem menor do que os dados destina-se para apresentar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo é normalmente utilizado para apresentar informações de ajuda ou informações de estado sobre a sua aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: Muitas vezes, é importante visualizar informações adicionais sobre os dados que são apresentados no painel de um.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>propriedade para apresentar informações sempre que o ponteiro do rato assenta num painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo é normalmente utilizado para apresentar informações textual, também pode fornecer o seu próprio tipo de visualização para uma StatusBarPanel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the StatusBarPanel will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>propriedade permite-lhe especificar a forma como o StatusBarPanel será desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>propriedade é utilizada para apresentar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>propriedade (e um ícone, se especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>propriedade).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, pode desenhar as suas próprias informações para o painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta funcionalidade para desenhar uma barra de progresso ou um ícone animado no painel.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the StatusBarPanel class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância da classe StatusBarPanel, as propriedades de leitura/escrita são definidas para valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista destes valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/escrita estão definidas para valores iniciais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|100| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|&10; | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>| Uma cadeia de comprimento zero. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>| Uma cadeia de comprimento zero. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|&100; | Pode alterar o valor para qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento do texto e ícones dentro do painel de barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade horizontalmente alinhar o texto e/ou ícone atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>propriedade dentro de limites do painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Texto e ícones podem estar alinhados para a esquerda, direita, ou o centro da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhuma forma de forma independente posicionar um ícone na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, não é possível posicionar um ícone no lado esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>ao alinhar o texto no lado direito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: O ícone sempre está posicionado no lado esquerdo do texto, independentemente da forma como o texto é alinhado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é um membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel da barra de estado é automaticamente redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>têm precedência sobre os painéis definidos como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que tem a respetiva propriedade AutoSize definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>é shortened se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>com a propriedade AutoSize definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>requer esse espaço.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoSize to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar AutoSize para se certificar de que o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>são apresentados corretamente num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo que contém mais do que um painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, poderá pretender que um painel que contém o texto para ajustar automaticamente para a quantidade de texto que apresenta (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), enquanto outro painel no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>que mostra uma barra de progresso desenhada de proprietário seria necessário ter um tamanho fixo (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é um membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa a inicialização de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para iniciar a inicialização de um componente que é utilizada num formulário ou a ser utilizada por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>método termina a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>métodos impede que o controlo a ser utilizada antes de ser completamente inicializada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do limite do painel de barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para diferenciar um painel a partir de outros painéis num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é um membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Termina a inicialização de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para terminar a inicialização de um componente que é utilizado por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>método inicia a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>e métodos de EndInit impede que o controlo a ser utilizada antes de ser completamente inicializada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ícone para apresentar no painel de barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para apresentar um ícone que representa o estado da sua aplicação ou um processo na sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode apresentar um ícone num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>para indicar se um ficheiro de operação de gravação está em curso ou completos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não há nenhuma forma de forma independente posicionar um ícone na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, não é possível posicionar um ícone no lado esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>ao alinhar o texto do lado direito, utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: O ícone sempre está posicionado no lado esquerdo do texto do painel, independentemente da forma como o texto é alinhado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> que representa o ícone a apresentado no painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o mínimo permitido largura do painel de barra de estado dentro de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The MinWidth property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MinWidth é utilizada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>para impedir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>de redimensionamento automaticamente para a largura que é demasiado pequena.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, the MinWidth property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, a propriedade MinWidth é automaticamente definida para o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura mínima, em pixels, do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inferior a 0 é atribuído à propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome para aplicar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control that hosts the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo que aloja o painel da barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlar que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>está contido num.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos que são adicionados a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo é acessível através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> que contém o painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do painel de barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para indicar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>apresenta o texto ou se o painel é gerido como um proprietário-desenhada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>tem de ser desenhado, crie um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>transmitida como um parâmetro para um processador de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>eventos permite-lhe determinar qual painel tem de ser desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>Também fornece um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto, que pode utilizar para efetuar tarefas de desenho no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é um membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que contém os dados sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto do painel de barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o texto que é apresentado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para apresentar informações sobre a sua aplicação num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Text property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode utilizar a propriedade de texto a apresentar informações de ajuda quando o utilizador move o rato sobre um menu ou para apresentar o nome e a localização de um ficheiro que é aberto numa aplicação.

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alinhar o texto dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: O texto apresentado no painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto da descrição associado com o painel da barra de estado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para visualizar informações adicionais numa descrição, se o ponteiro do rato assenta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode apresentar uma descrição que fornece a velocidade de transferência de dados para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que apresenta o estado de uma transferência de ficheiros.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar as descrições para outros controlos na sua aplicação, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: O texto de descrição para o painel.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que contém informações sobre o painel.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que contém o nome de classe para o controlo e o texto contém.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura do painel de barra de estado dentro de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Width property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Width sempre reflete a largura real de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>e não pode ser inferior a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Redimensionar automaticamente a largura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>aos conteúdos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: A largura especificada é inferior ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>
